name: Create a Sales Lead Appointment for a customer having not logged in

testSteps.description: Given I have not logged into the API
And I have not located a customer

When I create a sales lead appointment for a customer with values:
| cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime |
| 0100000933079696000 | 83018 | Regular Savings | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

children.description: Create sales lead appointment: | cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime | | 0100000933079696000 | 83018 | Regular Savings | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Authorisation Error

userStory.storyName: Create Sales Lead Appointment for customer
